mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT p.gds_no) FROM products p LEFT JOIN ( SELECT p_inner.gds_no, CASE WHEN latest_history.aprv_stts_cd = '승인' AND p_inner.expsr_yn = 1 THEN '판매중' WHEN latest_history.aprv_stts_cd = '승인' AND p_inner.expsr_yn = 0 THEN '판매중지' ELSE latest_history.aprv_stts_cd END AS status_cd FROM products p_inner -- [수정된 부분] ROW_NUMBER()를 사용해 각 상품의 유일한 최신 이력을 선택 JOIN ( SELECT gds_no, aprv_stts_cd FROM ( SELECT gds_no, aprv_stts_cd, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY gds_no ORDER BY aprv_rjct_cycl DESC, prcs_dt DESC) as rn FROM product_approval_history ) ranked_history WHERE rn = 1 ) AS latest_history ON p_inner.gds_no = latest_history.gds_no ) v ON p.gds_no = v.gds_no

SELECT p.gds_no, p.gds_nm, p.sel_user_no, p.reg_dt, p.last_sel_prc, IFNULL(ps.total_stock, 0) AS total_stock, v.status_cd FROM products p LEFT JOIN ( SELECT gds_no, SUM(sel_psblty_qntty) as total_stock FROM product_status WHERE actvtn_yn = 1 GROUP BY gds_no ) ps ON p.gds_no = ps.gds_no LEFT JOIN ( SELECT p_inner.gds_no, CASE WHEN latest_history.aprv_stts_cd = '승인' AND p_inner.expsr_yn = 1 AND IFNULL(total_stock_check.total_stock, -1) > 0 THEN '판매중' WHEN latest_history.aprv_stts_cd = '승인' AND p_inner.expsr_yn = 1 AND IFNULL(total_stock_check.total_stock, -1) = 0 THEN '품절' WHEN latest_history.aprv_stts_cd = '승인' AND p_inner.expsr_yn = 0 THEN '판매중지' ELSE latest_history.aprv_stts_cd END AS status_cd FROM products p_inner -- [수정된 부분] ROW_NUMBER()를 사용해 각 상품의 유일한 최신 이력을 선택 JOIN ( SELECT gds_no, aprv_stts_cd FROM ( SELECT gds_no, aprv_stts_cd, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY gds_no ORDER BY aprv_rjct_cycl DESC, prcs_dt DESC) as rn FROM product_approval_history ) ranked_history WHERE rn = 1 ) AS latest_history ON p_inner.gds_no = latest_history.gds_no LEFT JOIN ( SELECT gds_no, SUM(sel_psblty_qntty) as total_stock FROM product_status WHERE actvtn_yn = 1 GROUP BY gds_no ) total_stock_check ON p_inner.gds_no = total_stock_check.gds_no ) v ON p.gds_no = v.gds_no
